column17:
Nike Black Men Jacket FZ(402304-011):
Nike presents this smart black jacket that scores high on both looks and utility. This jacket is made of a quality material that is ideal for winters as it retains the heat and warmth. A hint of vibrant red on the sleeves add a pop of colour and contrast to this smart apparel. This jacket features sleeves characterised by elasticised cuffs and high neck which gives it a stylish look. Further the two zippered pockets provided on the front ensure that you carry your essentials like wallet mobile phones etc. safely.
